attributes.action: stop ripping the public off through petrol prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are we the british public paying amongst the highest petrol prices in Europe.
Why should you do a day's work just to fill up your petrol tank to work a week!
SCANDALOUS!!!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Petrol-tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
